programme.title: Xploration DIY Sci S5 - "The Higgins Show"
programme.desc: After years of feeling like he’s been the butt of all of Steve Spangler’s jokes, his sidekick Higginsworth threatens to leave unless Steve quits his pranks.

programme.title: Space Greed S1 - "Above The Law"
programme.desc: Who decides the law in space? And how will it be enforced?

programme.title: Space Greed S1 - "Toxic Space Factories"
programme.desc: Will it ever make sense to use outer space to offshore human pollution and waste?

programme.title: Space Greed S1 - "Suing Our Way To Space"
programme.desc: Cowboy hat-wearing billionaires have reasons for their multi-billion dollar investment in space exploration but it’s hard to ignore how much money they stand to make.

programme.title: To The Moon
programme.desc: To The Moon – From Dream To Reality looks back at the people and the technology of the Apollo era.

programme.title: The New Frontier S3 - "Living in Space"
programme.desc: How do astronauts cope with living in space? The unique environment, the lack of taste in their food and the smell of canned air all contribute to the stresses of living and working in space.

programme.title: The New Frontier S3 - "Atmosphere"
programme.desc: Climate change and pollution are having dire consequences for the atmosphere of our planet, this episode updates the latest technology and science looking into the health of our air.

programme.title: The New Frontier S3 - "Flight Status"
programme.desc: The latest updates on the new space hardware about to launch us into the next generation of space flight some rockets and capsules are on time others not so fortunate.

programme.title: The New Frontier S3 - "Invasion Mars"
programme.desc: The EXO Mars and Curiosity continue their scientific discoveries as we prepare new missions both robotic and manned to the Red planet Mars.

programme.title: Xploration Outer Space S3 - "Stories from Space"
programme.desc: Host Emily Calandrelli visits each astronaut, including Story Musgrave, the only astronaut to fly aboard all five space shuttles, and Anna Fisher, one of the first American females to go into space.

programme.title: Xploration Outer Space S3 - "Second Annual Student Astronaut Contest"
programme.desc: Going aboard a Zero-G aircraft where they’ll experience microgravity with host, Emily Calandrelli.

programme.title: Bright Now S1 - "Path to the Pros"
programme.desc: What does it take to become a professional tennis player? Both on and off the court preparations help build the streght of character and focused mind to take on the challenges of a sport that demands precision and superior athleticism.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded S1 - "Volcanoes"
programme.desc: Explore with us the most deadliest eruptions in the world… sleeping, deadly beauty.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded S1 - "Tornadoes"
programme.desc: Explore with us the most destructive tornadoes in history, why could no one predict it?

programme.title: Destruction Decoded S1 - "Crashes"
programme.desc: Join us as we investigate the worst plane, train and ship disasters of all time.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded S1 - "Man Made Disasters"
programme.desc: Explore with us how a manmade disaster could be as much destructive as some natural disaster.

programme.title: Bright Now S1 - "Apocalypse 101"
programme.desc: Could you find a way to survive in a post-apocalyptic world? Astrobiologist and author Lewis Dartnell explores what it would take to stay alive following a global cataclysm, and what knowledge we would need to rebuild civilization as we know it.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet S6 - "Sustainable Leaders"
programme.desc: In this episode, we’ll visit a facility in Reno that makes biofuel for United Airlines aircraft.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet S6 - "Slovenia"
programme.desc: In this episode, we travel to the country of Slovenia and look at how karst rock has led to the formation of over 12,000 caves across the country.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet S6 - "Animal Rescue"
programme.desc: In this episode, we will visit a few different animal rescues centers starting with the marine mammal centre in Vancouver as they tend to orphaned harbor seals.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet S6 - "Invasive Planet"
programme.desc: In this episode, we see a few different ways researchers are fighting invasive plants, animals, and materials in native habitats.

programme.title: Suppressed Science S1 - "Human Enhancement"
programme.desc: From a cutting-edge, science-based gym & spa, to a medical clinic that offers direct ultrasound brain stimulation designed to increase mental performance.

programme.title: Suppressed Science S1 - "Genetic Editing"
programme.desc: The discovery of CRISPR Cas-9 in 2012 opened up seemingly limitless potential in the field of genetic editing.

programme.title: Suppressed Science S1 - "Alternative Energy Sources"
programme.desc: In this installment, Athena decodes some of the difficulties faced by the scientists & environmentalists looking to fundamentally change our relationship with energy.

programme.title: Suppressed Science S1 - "Theories Of Everything"
programme.desc: Over the centuries, scientific theories have emerged that rival religious cosmology in terms of ambition and scope. But can science ever truly explain everything?

programme.title: Extraordinary Humans S2 - "Jerry Miculek"
programme.desc: Thom heads to Louisiana to meet Jerry Miculek, the human machine gun who can fire a handgun faster than an automatic weapon.

programme.title: Extraordinary Humans S2 - "Dean Karnazes"
programme.desc: Thom Hunt heads to Nevada, to meet Dean Karnazes, an ultramarathon runner who’s taken endurance running to a level that defies human biology.

programme.title: Extraordinary Humans S2 - "Claudia Hughes"
programme.desc: Thom travels to the UK to track down real life rubber girl Claudia Hughes, a contortionist whose extraordinary flexibility defies human physiology.

programme.title: Extraordinary Humans S2 - "Tom Sietas"
programme.desc: Thom travels to the UK to track down Aquaman Tom Sietas, who can hold his breath submerged for a death defying 22 minutes.

programme.title: Xploration Earth 2050 S1 - "The Future of Entertainment"
programme.desc: Join host Joe Penna as he visits with people creating operas—with robots.

programme.title: Xploration Earth 2050 S2 - "The Future Of Living Spaces"
programme.desc: Join host Chuck Pell as he explores modern apartments built on assembly lines.

programme.title: Xploration Earth 2050 S2 - "The Future Of Clothing"
programme.desc: Join host Chuck Pell as he goes to New York’s fashion district to try the latest… in electric clothes.

programme.title: Xploration Earth 2050 S2 - "The Future Of Urban Farms"
programme.desc: Join host Chuck Pell as he eats a salad grown on the rooftop of a Boston high-rise.

programme.title: Earthrise S1 - "Protecting Precious Landscapes"
programme.desc: We discover rich landscapes threatened by industrial development and the fight to save these precious ecosystems.

programme.title: Earthrise S1 - "The Case for the Climate"
programme.desc: Earthrise meets some of the lawyers and campaigners who are putting polluters in the dock and forcing systems change through the courts.

programme.title: Earthrise S1 - "Fixing the Food Cycle"
programme.desc: Earthrise travels to Kenya and South Korea to look at two initiatives which are redress some of the imbalances in our unsustainable and wasteful global food system.

programme.title: Earthrise S1 - "Change of Power"
programme.desc: Earthrise goes to Norway and the Orkney Islands in the UK to explore two solutions with a part to play in the transition to a carbon neutral world.

programme.title: World's Wildest City: Anchorage S1 - "Wild Rescue"
programme.desc: With so many animals living in the city, sometimes they get themselves into trouble. But help is never far away. In Anchorage the wildlife come first, with lots of organisations and people that are working hard to protect them.

programme.title: Shark Dive TV S1 - "Sand Tiger Sharks as Protectors"
programme.desc: Shark Dive TV demonstrates how Sand Tiger Sharks act as protectors and takes a Deeper Dive by explaining male vs female shark differences, shark reproduction, Gray Reef Sharks and shark buoyancy.

programme.title: Shark Dive TV S1 - "Hunting for Megalodon Shark teeth"
programme.desc: Shark Dive TV goes on a hunt for Megalodon Shark teeth and takes a Deeper Dive with Megalodon Sharks, Prickly Sharks, and Sand Tiger Sharks.

programme.title: Ocean Vet S1 - "The Bermuda Black Grouper"
programme.desc: Neil combines his veterinary knowledge and dive skills to assist the Bermuda department of fisheries on a exciting and dangerous mission to protect the breeding grounds of the Bermuda black grouper.

programme.title: Ocean Vet S1 - "Night Sharks"
programme.desc: Follow Neil and his team as they perform a surgical procedure to implant an acoustic tag in the abdomen of a juvenile tiger shark in a bid to reveal how often these animals return close to Bermuda’s shores at night.

programme.title: Wild Ones S1 - "DANGEROUS ON LAND"
programme.desc: Wild Ones draws inspiration from the rhythms of nature, delving into the wonders of the animal kingdom. This captivating series explores the diverse behaviors that define survival—hunting and feeding strategies, family bonds, defense tactics, and the intricacies of courtship and mating. Who reigns supreme in the wild? Discover the untold stories of nature's fiercest competitors and most fascinating creatures.

programme.title: Wild Ones S1 - "CUTEST"
programme.desc: Wild Ones draws inspiration from the rhythms of nature, delving into the wonders of the animal kingdom. This captivating series explores the diverse behaviors that define survival—hunting and feeding strategies, family bonds, defense tactics, and the intricacies of courtship and mating. Who reigns supreme in the wild? Discover the untold stories of nature's fiercest competitors and most fascinating creatures.

programme.title: Blue World S6 - "The Amazing Comeback of Gray Seals"
programme.sub-title: The Amazing Comeback of Gray Seals
programme.desc: Blue World joins a team of seal researchers on Cape Cod, and dives with these adorable pups of the sea to tell their story.
